author: Angus Loten
title: Tech Leaders Map Out Post-Pandemic Return to Workplace - The Wall Street Journal
description: Information-technology workers will likely be in first wave of employees returning to job site, report says
content: Businesses will be turning to enterprise technology to smooth out the process of getting employees back to the workplace in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, according to a report by Forrester Research. Technology leaders say safety will be a top priority… [+4935 chars]
